prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John Henry Ingram's Poe Collection, Accession #38-135, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased by the University of Virginia Library on June 8, 1994.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of five sheets of galleys for Recollections of Swinburne,by John Henry Ingram, with autograph corrections, published in T.P.'s Monthly, ca. 1890, discussing Algernon Charles Swinburne's (1837-1909) recollections of Edgar Allan Poeand Rufus Wilmot Griswold's critical biography of Poe. Special Collections also has the original manuscript of this essay in Accession #38-135, item 473-a.
